summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's lightweight Nutrient-Charged Water Gel instantly locks in hydration, increases water retention and improves texture, plumpness & bounce
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight gel moisturizer with 5 vitamins, 5 minerals and 5 peptides for hydration that lasts up to 5 days*Locks in hydration, soothes and reduces drynessRestores skin barrier, and improves skin tone and texture*Tested after 3 weeks of continuous use.Key IngredientsCumulative Hydration Technology: instantly locks in moisture and enhances retention for up to 5 days5 Vitamins (B3, B5, B6, B9, E): soothe and reduce dryness5 Minerals (Silicon, Iron, Zinc, Copper, Magnesium) + 5 Peptides: support skin tone and texture, while peptides work to help restore the skin's barrierResearch ResultsIn a technology-tested clinical study of 20 people, after 3 weeks of continuous use:100% showed skin barrier repair in 30 minutesItem 2544841How To UseUse AM and PM. After cleansing and toning, massage a dime-size amount over face, neck and chest. Follow with a Murad SPF. Using too much product or not allowing it to absorb fully can cause pilling, as can layering over silicone-based serums.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Propanediol, Saccharide Isomerate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane/Silica Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, sh-Oligopeptide-1, sh-Oligopeptide-2, sh-Polypeptide-1, sh-Polypeptide-9, sh-Polypeptide-11, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Saccharomyces/Magnesium Ferment, Saccharomyces/Iron Ferment, Saccharomyces/Silicon Ferment, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Bacillus/Folic Acid Ferment Extract, Trehalose, Taurine, Serine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Calcium Pantothenate, Niacinamide, Phytantriol, Acetyl Glutamine, Urea, Cholesterol, Yeast Amino Acids, Phytosphingosine, Inositol, Betaine, Lecithin, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pyridoxine HCl, Sucrose, Algin, Pullulan, Maltodextrin, Polysilicone-11, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Decyl Glucoside, Pentylene Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Polyisobutene, Silica, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, PEG-7 Trimethylolpropane Coconut Ether, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Disodium Phosphate, Potassium Phosphate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Red 33 (CI 17200), Red 4 (CI 14700).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use AM and PM. After cleansing and toning, massage a dime-size amount over face, neck and chest. Follow with a Murad SPF. Using too much product or not allowing it to absorb fully can cause pilling, as can layering over silicone-based serums.

reviews.headline: My PCOS skin loves!
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer so much! I have very acne prone combination skin and ive been using this product for maybe 5 months now and i absolutely dont regret soending the money for it. I usually always love Murad products for my acne skin. Also, does not flake at all

reviews.headline: Love it but...it flakes
reviews.comments: I LOOOOVE this moisturizer....but.. it flakes/pills on me once it dries. I always have to take a dry towel and rub my face a few minutes after applying. Otherwise, I end up with like a light film everywhere. I don't understand it because I do feel like it absorbs, and it's not because I don't exfoliate. It's only this product that does it, which sucks because I have oily/combo skin and sometimes get cystic acne, and this moisturizer is the only one that doesn't break me out and doesn't leave me greasy. I'd rather deal with the flaking than breaking out, so I keep getting it!

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I love using this product. I have combination skin and this works wonder, especially for my really dry areas. You can never go wrong with Murad products!

reviews.headline: never flakes likes reviews say
reviews.comments: I use this daily and it's not flaky at all. I use a hyaluronic acid essence first, then I use the rapid dark spot correcto, hyper real serumizer, then this water gel. my skin feels hydrated and light. I top it with the serum sunscreen and my skin is glowing ‚ú®Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Beautiful, glowing water cream
reviews.comments: Feels luxurious on skin, smooths and blurs, and hydrates. Just enough moisture for daytime and under makeup.

reviews.headline: Keeps my skin looking fresh and healthy üòÉ
reviews.comments:
I have been using this cream for a couple of years and I can see the difference it's light and my skin looks very hydrated it's not greasy at all
Really love it

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: One of my favorite everyday moisturizers! Have rebought it several times

reviews.headline: Surprised I repurchased!
reviews.comments: This is my second tub of this stuff and I'm obsessed. We have hot humid summers and this stuff is so fast absorbing I use it in the evening before bed. But in the winter I do morning and night. I ran out for a month and tried to just use my squalene oil, but noticed this rough texture on my skin that I never had when I had this moisturizer handy! 10/10 recommend especially if you're trying to repair your skin barrier! I didn't realize how much this helped until I was out! (I only wish it was unscented)

reviews.headline: Expensive but good
reviews.comments: I bought this a few months ago and been using it sparingly because it's expensive and when I do use it, I notice my skin hydrated and plumped . It feels watery going on,but it dose moistens and plumps very nicely.

reviews.headline: I tried it, I didn't love it
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this. I have combo to oily skin that is also sensitive, and I generally love water water cream formula. The Murad Water Gel has a nice texture. It's not too light that it gives too little moisture and it's more gel than cream so not too heavy either. There is a light floral fragrance to the cream, too. Again, the level of moisture feels right for my skin, but what I don't love about this is it pills. I only use it at night because there's no use trying to put make-up over it. I often wake up in the mornings with tiny little gel clumps on my face, even with very light application. For the price, it doesn't feel worth it for me not to be able to use it both night and day and to literally have it come off my face.

reviews.headline: Pilling :(
reviews.comments: I want to love this product so much. The fragrance and feel of this product are to die for. It's lightweight, but hydrating, and leave my skin looking glowy after application. However, no matter how I've applied it, I find that it pills off my skin  every day. For that, I probably won't purchase again.

reviews.headline: My favorite of the Murad line
reviews.comments: This has been my go-to product for my morning and night routine for about 2 years now. It's very lightweight and blends well without looking greasy. It may not mesh with every serum and moisturizer so be a little careful what you mix with it, but it blends perfectly well over my Lancome Genefique drops and under my Strivectin or Philosophy moisturizers.  If you see this during the Beauty Steals month for 50% off, STOCK UP, just leave some for me!

reviews.headline: so hydrating
reviews.comments: it's like my skin was drink water for the first time. it's gives you a glass skin look as well super hydration but very light

reviews.headline: pills under makeup
reviews.comments: I love the texture of the product and would be happy with it except for the fact that it pills and crumbles when I put sunscreen or makeup over it. that's a shame since the texture makes it nice for a daytime moisturizer.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product over and over again.
reviews.comments: My face is sensitive prone to breakouts very dry. Only 3 days of use my skin has turned a 360.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Moisturizer for Combo Skin
reviews.comments:
This moisturizer is everything! I have dry/combo, acne prone and sensitive skin. It hydrates my skin without breaking me out and feels amazing. It has a "slip" similar to primer, so I don't need to use primer under my makeup anymore.

The formulation also has multiple peptides and ceramides towards the top of the ingredient list, meaning I don't need separate products to include them in my routine. I hope Murad never discontinues this! I'm on my 4th jar and won't be straying anytime soon.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: I really like it observes really quickly hydrating and leave my skin nice and smooth

reviews.headline: Lightweight, but it flakes off
reviews.comments: I use Murad products regularly. I took one of their quizzes online and this product was recommended. Well, I saw it on sale one time and purchased it @ulta. As someone who regularly exfoliates, I expected this to drink into my skin, but it just sat. When dry (I usually wait 10 mins before applying makeup) it flakes off when I start to put on my foundation. So, I tried an option where I washed my face, patted dry, then just put this on with no other Murad serums beforehand. Still dry/tight and flakes off. I have combination skin and wanted something lightweight and stuck with the Murad brand of products but this was a no.

reviews.headline: I wish I could give this zero stars
reviews.comments: ok so to begin I had high hopes for this moisturizer to work well especially with my skin being dehydrated. I applied this to my skin and it absorbed extremely quickly and within a few minutes it begins to peel. absolutely disgusting I will never buy anything from this brand again. I have had bad experiences in the past with this brand and thought I would give it another try however that was a bad idea. I literally washed off this moisturizer and applied my 10 dollar moisturizer and have not experienced any issues since... absolutely disgusting.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: This is my favorite moisturize. It smells good and works great for me. I use it at night and my skin looks so good and plump in the morning. I only get this when on sale because it is too pricey.

media.headline: I would buy this product over and over again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I had started using Neutrogena water gel moisturizer and I liked it until I tried the Murad nutrient charged water gel and I was blown away literally Blown Away by how amazing this gel is! it has a very light Rose lilac scent that is Pleasant very faint and it goes away right after it's absorbed so it's not a heavy scented gel and it is the consistency of gel and it's cooling on your face and it absorbs quickly without greasy fingers or greasy feeling on your face! and the hydration is without equal and I have tried every type of moisturizer for my sensitive mature skin from drugstore brand to The highest-end Prestige brands. it also seems to blur the look of Fine Lines and leaves your skin looking smooth and beautiful after each use! I use this as my third step in my skin care regimen after using the Murad hydro dynamic eye cream and it works fabulous together I would not change this for anything! I just turned 54 and my skin has very few wrinkles or sagging and I attribute that to the Murad products I have been using consistently and religiously! I have are there Murad products that also are the best I've ever used including their spot acne treatment because even at my age you occasionally get a blemish and this gets rid of it without the flaking and drying of other acne treatments! Dr. Murad was a genius of skin care! I just literally cannot say enough about this product or any Murad product! If you're on the fence about trying this it is so worth the price a little goes a long way so don't use a lot at first go easy with it and find your perfect amount from there. One 1.7 ounce jar lasts me quite a while and I use it twice a day regularly and religiously! it goes great under makeup and makes Foundation look so much smoother sometimes I don't even use a primer because my skin looks so nice I often don't even go without any foundation just this moisturizer! I realize this is a very long review I generally don't leave many reviews but I feel very strongly about this product it is amazing just amazing! It is well worth the money and I assure you, you will be more than pleased with your purchase!!
faceoff_positive.headline: HOLY GRAIL MOISTURIZER!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I had never tried a water-gel before, but after reading these reviews I was sold! My skin is normal/combo. The initial application was so nice. I don't have sensitive skin so I didn't mind that this product has fragrance. 

I started noticing some negative changes to my skin immediately, including tightness in my skin toward the evening times which had never happened before. It's important to note that I did not change any other aspect of my skincare routine. My skin has never been extremely dry or flaky but I realized there was a problem when I wore the CC cream I've used for +2 years (IT cosmetics CC cream) and saw actual flakiness! With quarantine, I only wear makeup once a week so I was shocked to see my skin flake.

I used this product twice a day, every day for three weeks. I finally decided to exchange it for the First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream which has been working fabulously!

I'm giving this two stars because it's important to note that I live in a dry climate which might be a contributing factor to this products inificieny towards my skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not Good for my Dry Skin
